description: Allen-Bradley 2711P-T10C6D1 PanelView Plus 1000 Color Terminal 10.4 inch, Touch Screen, DH+, DH-485, RIO and Standard Communication (Ethernet and RS-232), 64 MB Flash, 64 MB RAM, DC power, Series A
miscellaneous: Allen-Bradley 2711P-T10C6D1 terminal has a lithium battery that is used by the real-time clock and static RAM. It is not used for application backup or retention. The clock module has a life expectancy of two years without power. The 2711P-T10C6D1 terminal has two USB ports. The 2711P-T10C6D1 terminal supports standard USB keyboard and mouse devices (HID devices) with native device drivers. It also supports some USB printers that have Printer Control Language (PCL) capabilities.
